document.ModsDocTitle: New records of two endemic troglobitic and threatened arachnids (Amblypygi and Opiliones) from limestone caves of Minas Gerais state, southeast Brazil
document.docAuthor: do Monte, Bruno Gabriel O, Gallao, Jonas Eduardo, von Schimonsky, Diego M & Bichuette, Maria Elina
document.masterDocTitle: New records of two endemic troglobitic and threatened arachnids (Amblypygi and Opiliones) from limestone caves of Minas Gerais state, southeast Brazil

subSubSection.paragraph: According to 2014 IUCN revision, this species is CR (Critically Endangered) category.
Expansion of occurrence of troglobitic species previously known for only a single cave.
